alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Kaufman; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kaufman, southwestern Van Zandt and north central Henderson Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gun Barrel City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gun Barrel City, Canton, Mabank, Tool, Seven Points, Kemp, Eustace, Enchanted Oaks, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Purtis Creek State Park, Flag Lake, Payne Springs, Whitton, Phalba, Tolosa, Roddy, Jackson, Walton and Tundra. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
